SELECT MA.MEASURE_DT as MT_MDATE, ROUND(MA.AGE, 1) as AGE, MA.RSLT_ANLY1, MA.RSLT_ANLY2, MI.CHCK_DATE as MI_CHCK_DATE, ROUND(MI.MSA, 1) as MI_MSA, ROUND(MI.MAOA, 1) as MI_MAOA, ROUND(MI.MHTNA, 1) as MI_MHTNA, ROUND(MI.MDMA, 1) as MI_MDMA, ROUND(MI.MDLA, 1) as MI_MDLA, MI.B_CHCK_DATE as MI_B_CHCK_DATE, ROUND(MI.B_MSA, 1) as MI_B_MSA, ROUND(MI.B_MAOA, 1) as MI_B_MAOA, ROUND(MI.B_MHTNA, 1) as MI_B_MHTNA, ROUND(MI.B_MDMA, 1) as MI_B_MDMA, ROUND(MI.B_MDLA, 1) as MI_B_MDLA, MI.BB_CHCK_DATE as MI_BB_CHCK_DATE, ROUND(MI.BB_MSA, 1) as MI_BB_MSA, ROUND(MI.BB_MAOA, 1) as MI_BB_MAOA, ROUND(MI.BB_MHTNA, 1) as MI_BB_MHTNA, ROUND(MI.BB_MDMA, 1) as MI_BB_MDMA, ROUND(MI.BB_MDLA, 1) as MI_BB_MDLA, MI.DGNS as MI_DGNS, MI.DGNS_GUID as MI_DGNS_GUID, MP.META_PDF_PATH FROM ( SELECT MBER_NO, MEASURE_DT, RSLT_ANLY1, AGE, RSLT_ANLY2 FROM MEDIAGE_MBER_META_ANL_RESULT WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} ORDER BY MEASURE_DT DESC LIMIT 1 ) MA LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO, MEASURE_DT AS CHCK_DATE, MSA, MAOA, MHTNA, MDMA, MDLA, B_CHCK_DATE, B_MSA, B_MAOA, B_MHTNA, B_MDMA, B_MDLA, BB_CHCK_DATE, BB_MSA, BB_MAOA, BB_MHTNA, BB_MDMA, BB_MDLA, DGNS, DGNS_GUID FROM MEDIAGE_MBER_META_INTERVAL_RESULT WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} ORDER BY MEASURE_DT DESC LIMIT 1 ) MI ON MA.MBER_NO = MI.MBER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO, MEASURE_DT AS CHCK_DATE, FILE_PATH AS META_PDF_PATH FROM MEDIAGE_MBER_META_PDF_RESULT WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} ORDER BY MEASURE_DT DESC LIMIT 1 ) MP ON MA.MBER_NO = MP.MBER_NO

SELECT IFNULL(A.WAIST, 0) AS WAIST, IFNULL(B.SYS, 0) AS SYS, IFNULL(B.DIA, 0) AS DIA, IFNULL(C.FBS, 0) AS FBS FROM ( SELECT MBER_NO, COUNT(MEDI_WAIST) AS WAIST FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN_TIME WHERE MBER_NO = 307461 AND MEDI_WAIST IS NOT NULL ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO, COUNT(SYSTOLIC) AS SYS, COUNT(DIASTOLIC) AS DIA FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN_TIME WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND SYSTOLIC IS NOT NULL AND DIASTOLIC IS NOT NULL ) B ON A.MBER_NO = B.MBER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO, COUNT(FBS) AS FBS FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN_TIME WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND FBS IS NOT NULL
) C ON A.MBER_NO = C.MBER_NO

SELECT OBA.MBER_NO, OBA.OB_MDATE, ROUND(OBA.AGE, 1) as AGE, ROUND(OBA.BFA, 1) as BFA, #체지방나이 ROUND(OBA.AOA, 1) as AOA, #복부비만나이 ROUND(OBA.BAA, 1) as BAA, #비만생체나이 ROUND(OBA.PBF, 1) as PBF, # OBA.AGING_RANK, #등수 OBA.TOTAL_GUID1, OBA.TOTAL_GUID2, OBA.TOTAL_GUID3, OBB.OutBW, #체중 관리 대상 여부 OBB.OutBMI, #BMI 관리 대상 여부 OBB.OutBF, #체지방량 관리 대상 여부 OBB.OutWC, #허리둘레 관리 대상 여부 OBB.OutWHR, #WHR 관리 대상 여부 OBI.CHCK_DT as OBI_CHCK_DT, ROUND(OBI.BAA, 1) as OBI_BAA, #비만나이 ROUND(OBI.AOA, 1) as OBI_AOA, #복부비만나이 ROUND(OBI.BFA, 1) as OBI_BFA, #체지방나이 OBI.B_CHCK_DT as OBI_B_CHCK_DT, ROUND(OBI.B_BAA, 1) as OBI_B_BAA, #비만나이 ROUND(OBI.B_AOA, 1) as OBI_B_AOA, #복부비만나이 ROUND(OBI.B_BFA, 1) as OBI_B_BFA, #체지방나이 OBI.BB_CHCK_DT as OBI_BB_CHCK_DT, ROUND(OBI.BB_BAA, 1) as OBI_BB_BAA, #비만나이 ROUND(OBI.BB_AOA, 1) as OBI_BB_AOA, #복부비만나이 ROUND(OBI.BB_BFA, 1) as OBI_BB_BFA, #체지방나이 OBP.OBSITY_PDF_PATH FROM ( SELECT MBER_NO, MEASURE_DT AS OB_MDATE, AGE, BFA, #체지방나이 AOA, #복부비만나이 BAA, #비만생체나이 PBF, # AGING_RANK, #등수 TOTAL_GUID1, TOTAL_GUID2, TOTAL_GUID3 FROM MEDIAGE_MBER_OBSITY_ANL_RESULT WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} ORDER BY MEASURE_DT DESC LIMIT 1 ) OBA LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO, OutBW, #체중 관리 대상 여부 OutBMI, #BMI 관리 대상 여부 OutBF, #체지방량 관리 대상 여부 OutWC, #허리둘레 관리 대상 여부 OutWHR #WHR 관리 대상 여부 FROM MEDIAGE_MBER_OBSITY_BIO_RESULT WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} ORDER BY MEASURE_DT DESC LIMIT 1
) OBB ON OBA.MBER_NO = OBB.MBER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO, CHCK_DT, BAA, #비만나이 AOA, #복부비만나이 BFA, #체지방나이 B_CHCK_DT, B_BAA, #비만나이 B_AOA, #복부비만나이 B_BFA, #체지방나이 BB_CHCK_DT, BB_BAA, #비만나이 BB_AOA, #복부비만나이 BB_BFA #체지방나이 FROM MEDIAGE_MBER_OBSITY_INTERVAL_RESULT WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} ORDER BY MEASURE_DT DESC LIMIT 1 ) OBI ON OBA.MBER_NO = OBI.MBER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO, MEASURE_DT AS CHCK_DATE, FILE_PATH AS OBSITY_PDF_PATH FROM MEDIAGE_MBER_OBSITY_PDF_RESULT WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} ORDER BY MEASURE_DT DESC LIMIT 1 ) OBP ON OBA.MBER_NO = OBP.MBER_NO

SELECT IFNULL(A.HT, 0) AS HT, IFNULL(B.WAIST, 0) AS WAIST, IFNULL(C.WT, 0) AS WT, IFNULL(D.BMI, 0) AS BMI, IFNULL(E.PBF, 0) AS PBF, IFNULL(F.FAT, 0) AS FAT FROM ( SELECT MBER_NO, COUNT(HEIGHT) AS HT FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN_TIME WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND HEIGHT IS NOT NULL ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO, COUNT(WAIST_CRCMFRNC) AS WAIST FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN_TIME WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND WAIST_CRCMFRNC IS NOT NULL ) B ON A.MBER_NO = B.MBER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO, COUNT(BDWGH) AS WT FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN_TIME WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND BDWGH IS NOT NULL ) C ON A.MBER_NO = C.MBER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO, COUNT(BMI) AS BMI FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN_TIME WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND BMI IS NOT NULL ) D ON A.MBER_NO = D.MBER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO, COUNT(PBF) AS PBF FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN_TIME WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND PBF IS NOT NULL ) E ON A.MBER_NO = E.MBER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO, COUNT(FAT_MAS) AS FAT FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN_TIME WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND FAT_MAS IS NOT NULL ) F ON A.MBER_NO = F.MBER_NO

SELECT MI.MBER_NO , MI.NM , IFNULL(MMS.CALC_DT, NULL) CALC_DT , IFNULL(MMS.TOT_SCORE, NULL) TOT_SCORE
, CASE WHEN TOT_SCORE <= 24.9 THEN 'VERY BAD' WHEN TOT_SCORE <= 49.9 THEN 'BAD' WHEN TOT_SCORE <= 74.9 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN TOT_SCORE <= 94.9 THEN 'GOOD' ELSE 'VERY GOOD' END HIR_GRADE
, CASE WHEN TOT_SCORE <= 24.9 THEN 'VERY BAD' WHEN TOT_SCORE <= 49.9 THEN 'BAD' WHEN TOT_SCORE <= 74.9 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN TOT_SCORE <= 94.9 THEN 'GOOD' ELSE 'VERY GOOD' END HIR_GRADE
, CASE WHEN TOT_SCORE <= 24.9 THEN 'VERY BAD' WHEN TOT_SCORE <= 49.9 THEN 'BAD' WHEN TOT_SCORE <= 74.9 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN TOT_SCORE <= 94.9 THEN 'GOOD' ELSE 'VERY GOOD' END HIR_GRADE
, CASE WHEN TOT_SCORE <= 24.9 THEN '매우 나쁨' WHEN TOT_SCORE <= 49.9 THEN '나쁨' WHEN TOT_SCORE <= 74.9 THEN '주의' WHEN TOT_SCORE <= 94.9 THEN '좋음' ELSE '매우 좋음' END HIR_GRADE
, CASE WHEN TOT_SCORE <= 49.9 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN TOT_SCORE <= 74.9 THEN '#ffce00' ELSE '#4ece85' END HIR_COLOR
, IFNULL(CAST(MMS.GRADE_PERCENT AS SIGNED), NULL) HIR_GRADE_PERCENT , FMS.FIRST_SCORE , CASE WHEN MMS.TOT_SCORE IS NOT NULL AND FMS.FIRST_SCORE IS NOT NULL THEN MMS.TOT_SCORE - FMS.FIRST_SCORE ELSE NULL END FIRST_CHANGE , LMS.LEGACY_SCORE , CASE WHEN MMS.TOT_SCORE IS NOT NULL AND LMS.LEGACY_SCORE IS NOT NULL THEN MMS.TOT_SCORE - LMS.LEGACY_SCORE ELSE NULL END LEGACY_CHANGE , AMS.AVG_SCORE FROM MBER_INFO MI LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO , CALC_DT , ROUND(TOT_SCORE, 1) TOT_SCORE
, CASE WHEN GRADE_PERCENT > 50 THEN (100 - GRADE_PERCENT) * -1 WHEN GRADE_PERCENT < 1 THEN 1 ELSE GRADE_PERCENT END GRADE_PERCENT FROM ( SELECT MBER_NO , CALC_DT , @RANK_COUNT := @RANK_COUNT + 1 , IF(@TOT_SCORE = TOT_SCORE, @RANK, @RANK := @RANK_COUNT) RN , IF(@TOT_SCORE = TOT_SCORE, @TOT_SCORE, @TOT_SCORE := TOT_SCORE) TOT_SCORE , TRUNCATE(@RANK / (MBER_CNT * 0.01), 0) GRADE_PERCENT FROM ( SELECT MI.MBER_NO , CALC_DT , IFNULL(TOT_SCORE, 0) TOT_SCORE FROM ( SELECT MBER_NO , BRTHDY , (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') - SUBSTR(BRTHDY, 1, 4)) + IF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%m%d') < SUBSTR(BRTHDY, 5, 8), -1, 0) AS AGE FROM MBER_INFO WHERE MBER_SECSN_AT = 'N' ) MI LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MMS.MBER_NO , MMS.CALC_DT , ROUND(((WAIST_SCORE * 100) + (BP_SCORE * 100) + (FBS_SCORE * 100) + (TG_SCORE * 100) + (HDLC_SCORE * 100)) / 5, 1) TOT_SCORE FROM MYBODY_MANAGE_SCORE MMS INNER JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO , MAX(CALC_DT) CALC_DT FROM MYBODY_MANAGE_SCORE GROUP BY MBER_NO ) MMMS ON MMS.MBER_NO = MMMS.MBER_NO AND MMS.CALC_DT = MMMS.CALC_DT ) MMS ON MI.MBER_NO = MMS.MBER_NO WHERE MI.AGE BETWEEN #{BEGIN_AGE} AND #{END_AGE} ORDER BY TOT_SCORE DESC ) MMS INNER JOIN (SELECT @TOT_SCORE := 0, @RANK := 0, @RANK_COUNT := 0, @MBER_CNT := 0) R INNER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) MBER_CNT FROM ( SELECT MBER_NO , (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') - SUBSTR(BRTHDY, 1, 4)) + IF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%m%d') < SUBSTR(BRTHDY, 5, 8), -1, 0) AS AGE FROM MBER_INFO WHERE MBER_SECSN_AT = 'N' ) MI WHERE MI.AGE BETWEEN #{BEGIN_AGE} AND #{END_AGE} ) MC ) TBL WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} ) MMS ON MI.MBER_NO = MMS.MBER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO , ROUND(((WAIST_SCORE * 100) + (BP_SCORE * 100) + (FBS_SCORE * 100) + (TG_SCORE * 100) + (HDLC_SCORE * 100)) / 5, 1) FIRST_SCORE FROM MYBODY_MANAGE_SCORE WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} ORDER BY CALC_DT ASC LIMIT 1 ) FMS ON MI.MBER_NO = FMS.MBER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MMS.MBER_NO , ROUND(((WAIST_SCORE * 100) + (BP_SCORE * 100) + (FBS_SCORE * 100) + (TG_SCORE * 100) + (HDLC_SCORE * 100)) / 5, 1) LEGACY_SCORE FROM MYBODY_MANAGE_SCORE MMS INNER JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO , MAX(CALC_DT) CALC_DT FROM MYBODY_MANAGE_SCORE WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} GROUP BY MBER_NO, SUBSTRING(CALC_DT, 1, 8) ) MMMS ON MMS.MBER_NO = MMMS.MBER_NO AND MMS.CALC_DT = MMMS.CALC_DT WHERE MMS.MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} ORDER BY MMS.CALC_DT DESC LIMIT 1, 1 ) LMS ON MI.MBER_NO = LMS.MBER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MMS.MBER_NO , ROUND(AVG(((WAIST_SCORE * 100) + (BP_SCORE * 100) + (FBS_SCORE * 100) + (TG_SCORE * 100) + (HDLC_SCORE * 100)) / 5), 1) AVG_SCORE FROM MYBODY_MANAGE_SCORE MMS INNER JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO , MAX(CALC_DT) CALC_DT FROM MYBODY_MANAGE_SCORE WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND CALC_DT >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -3 MONTH) GROUP BY MBER_NO, SUBSTRING(CALC_DT, 1, 8) ) MMMS ON MMS.MBER_NO = MMMS.MBER_NO AND MMS.CALC_DT = MMMS.CALC_DT WHERE MMS.MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} GROUP BY MMS.MBER_NO ) AMS ON MI.MBER_NO = AMS.MBER_NO WHERE MI.MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO}

SELECT MMS.CALC_DT
, ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) WAIST_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN 'VERY BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN 'BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN 'GOOD' ELSE 'VERY GOOD' END WAIST_GRADE
, ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) BP_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN 'VERY BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN 'BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN 'GOOD' ELSE 'VERY GOOD' END BP_GRADE , ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) FBS_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN 'VERY BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN 'BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN 'GOOD' ELSE 'VERY GOOD' END FBS_GRADE , ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) TG_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN 'VERY BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN 'BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN 'GOOD' ELSE 'VERY GOOD' END TG_GRADE , ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) HDLC_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN 'VERY BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN 'BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN 'GOOD' ELSE 'VERY GOOD' END HDLC_GRADE
, ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) WAIST_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN 'VERY BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN 'BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN 'GOOD' ELSE 'VERY GOOD' END WAIST_GRADE
, ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) BP_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN 'VERY BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN 'BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN 'GOOD' ELSE 'VERY GOOD' END BP_GRADE , ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) FBS_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN 'VERY BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN 'BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN 'GOOD' ELSE 'VERY GOOD' END FBS_GRADE , ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) TG_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN 'VERY BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN 'BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN 'GOOD' ELSE 'VERY GOOD' END TG_GRADE , ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) HDLC_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN 'VERY BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN 'BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN 'GOOD' ELSE 'VERY GOOD' END HDLC_GRADE
, ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) WAIST_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN 'VERY BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN 'BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN 'GOOD' ELSE 'VERY GOOD' END WAIST_GRADE
, ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) BP_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN 'VERY BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN 'BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN 'GOOD' ELSE 'VERY GOOD' END BP_GRADE , ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) FBS_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN 'VERY BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN 'BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN 'GOOD' ELSE 'VERY GOOD' END FBS_GRADE , ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) TG_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN 'VERY BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN 'BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN 'GOOD' ELSE 'VERY GOOD' END TG_GRADE , ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) HDLC_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN 'VERY BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN 'BAD' WHEN ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN 'GOOD' ELSE 'VERY GOOD' END HDLC_GRADE
, ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) WAIST_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN '매우 나쁨' WHEN ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN '나쁨' WHEN ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN '주의' WHEN ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN '좋음' ELSE '매우 좋음' END WAIST_GRADE
, ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) BP_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN '매우 나쁨' WHEN ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN '나쁨' WHEN ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN '주의' WHEN ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN '좋음' ELSE '매우 좋음' END BP_GRADE , ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) FBS_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN '매우 나쁨' WHEN ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN '나쁨' WHEN ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN '주의' WHEN ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN '좋음' ELSE '매우 좋음' END FBS_GRADE , ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) TG_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN '매우 나쁨' WHEN ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN '나쁨' WHEN ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN '주의' WHEN ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN '좋음' ELSE '매우 좋음' END TG_GRADE , ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) HDLC_SCORE , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 24.9 THEN '매우 나쁨' WHEN ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN '나쁨' WHEN ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN '주의' WHEN ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 94.9 THEN '좋음' ELSE '매우 좋음' END HDLC_GRADE
, CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN ROUND(MMS.WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN '#ffce00' ELSE '#4ece85' END WAIST_COLOR , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN ROUND(MMS.BP_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN '#ffce00' ELSE '#4ece85' END BP_COLOR , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN ROUND(MMS.FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN '#ffce00' ELSE '#4ece85' END FBS_COLOR , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN ROUND(MMS.TG_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN '#ffce00' ELSE '#4ece85' END TG_COLOR , CASE WHEN ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 49.9 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN ROUND(MMS.HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) <= 74.9 THEN '#ffce00' ELSE '#4ece85' END HDLC_COLOR
, ROUND(((WAIST_SCORE * 100) + (BP_SCORE * 100) + (FBS_SCORE * 100) + (TG_SCORE * 100) + (HDLC_SCORE * 100)) / 5, 1) TOT_SCORE FROM MYBODY_MANAGE_SCORE MMS WHERE MMS.MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND MMS.CALC_DT = #{CALC_DT}

SELECT MBER_NO , CALC_DT , CASE WHEN FBS_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR FBS_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '-' ELSE SUBSTRING(FBS_MESURE_DT, 1, 8) END FBS_MESURE_DT , CASE WHEN FBS_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR FBS_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, FBS_MESURE_DT) > 90 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, FBS_MESURE_DT) <= 1 THEN '#4ece85' ELSE '#000000' END FBS_COLOR , CASE WHEN HDLC_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR HDLC_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '-' ELSE SUBSTRING(HDLC_MESURE_DT, 1, 8) END HDLC_MESURE_DT , CASE WHEN HDLC_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR HDLC_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, HDLC_MESURE_DT) > 90 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, HDLC_MESURE_DT) <= 1 THEN '#4ece85' ELSE '#000000' END HDLC_COLOR , CASE WHEN TG_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR TG_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '-' ELSE SUBSTRING(TG_MESURE_DT, 1, 8) END TG_MESURE_DT , CASE WHEN TG_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR TG_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, TG_MESURE_DT) > 90 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, TG_MESURE_DT) <= 1 THEN '#4ece85' ELSE '#000000' END TG_COLOR , CASE WHEN BP_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR BP_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '-' ELSE SUBSTRING(BP_MESURE_DT, 1, 8) END BP_MESURE_DT , CASE WHEN BP_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR BP_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, BP_MESURE_DT) > 90 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, BP_MESURE_DT) <= 1 THEN '#4ece85' ELSE '#000000' END BP_COLOR , CASE WHEN WAIST_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR WAIST_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '-' ELSE SUBSTRING(WAIST_MESURE_DT, 1, 8) END WAIST_MESURE_DT , CASE WHEN WAIST_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR WAIST_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, WAIST_MESURE_DT) > 90 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, WAIST_MESURE_DT) <= 1 THEN '#4ece85' ELSE '#000000' END WAIST_COLOR , CASE WHEN LH_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR LH_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '-' ELSE SUBSTRING(LH_MESURE_DT, 1, 8) END LH_MESURE_DT , CASE WHEN LH_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR LH_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, LH_MESURE_DT) > 90 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, LH_MESURE_DT) <= 1 THEN '#4ece85' ELSE '#000000' END LH_COLOR , CASE WHEN MH_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR MH_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '-' ELSE SUBSTRING(MH_MESURE_DT, 1, 8) END MH_MESURE_DT , CASE WHEN MH_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR MH_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, MH_MESURE_DT) > 90 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, MH_MESURE_DT) <= 1 THEN '#4ece85' ELSE '#000000' END MH_COLOR , CASE WHEN SH_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR SH_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '-' ELSE SUBSTRING(SH_MESURE_DT, 1, 8) END SH_MESURE_DT , CASE WHEN SH_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR SH_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, SH_MESURE_DT) > 90 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, SH_MESURE_DT) <= 1 THEN '#4ece85' ELSE '#000000' END SH_COLOR FROM MYBODY_MANAGE_DATA WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND CALC_DT = #{CALC_DT}

SELECT MBER_NO , CALC_DT , CASE WHEN FBS_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR FBS_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '-' ELSE SUBSTRING(FBS_MESURE_DT, 1, 8) END FBS_MESURE_DT , CASE WHEN FBS_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR FBS_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '-' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, FBS_MESURE_DT) > 90 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, FBS_MESURE_DT) <= 1 THEN '#4ece85' ELSE '#000000' END FBS_COLOR , CASE WHEN HDLC_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR HDLC_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '-' ELSE SUBSTRING(HDLC_MESURE_DT, 1, 8) END HDLC_MESURE_DT , CASE WHEN HDLC_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR HDLC_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, HDLC_MESURE_DT) > 90 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, HDLC_MESURE_DT) <= 1 THEN '#4ece85' ELSE '#000000' END HDLC_COLOR , CASE WHEN TG_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR TG_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '-' ELSE SUBSTRING(TG_MESURE_DT, 1, 8) END TG_MESURE_DT , CASE WHEN TG_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR TG_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, TG_MESURE_DT) > 90 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, TG_MESURE_DT) <= 1 THEN '#4ece85' ELSE '#000000' END TG_COLOR , CASE WHEN BP_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR BP_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '-' ELSE SUBSTRING(BP_MESURE_DT, 1, 8) END BP_MESURE_DT , CASE WHEN BP_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR BP_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, BP_MESURE_DT) > 90 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, BP_MESURE_DT) <= 1 THEN '#4ece85' ELSE '#000000' END BP_COLOR , CASE WHEN WAIST_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR WAIST_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '-' ELSE SUBSTRING(WAIST_MESURE_DT, 1, 8) END WAIST_MESURE_DT , CASE WHEN WAIST_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR WAIST_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, WAIST_MESURE_DT) > 90 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, WAIST_MESURE_DT) <= 1 THEN '#4ece85' ELSE '#000000' END WAIST_COLOR , CASE WHEN LH_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR LH_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '-' ELSE SUBSTRING(LH_MESURE_DT, 1, 8) END LH_MESURE_DT , CASE WHEN LH_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR LH_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, LH_MESURE_DT) > 90 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, LH_MESURE_DT) <= 1 THEN '#4ece85' ELSE '#000000' END LH_COLOR , CASE WHEN MH_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR MH_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '-' ELSE SUBSTRING(MH_MESURE_DT, 1, 8) END MH_MESURE_DT , CASE WHEN MH_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR MH_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, MH_MESURE_DT) > 90 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, MH_MESURE_DT) <= 1 THEN '#4ece85' ELSE '#000000' END MH_COLOR , CASE WHEN SH_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR SH_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '-' ELSE SUBSTRING(SH_MESURE_DT, 1, 8) END SH_MESURE_DT , CASE WHEN SH_MESURE_DT IS NULL OR SH_MESURE_DT = '' THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, SH_MESURE_DT) > 90 THEN '#eb6060' WHEN DATEDIFF(CALC_DT, SH_MESURE_DT) <= 1 THEN '#4ece85' ELSE '#000000' END SH_COLOR FROM MYBODY_MANAGE_DATA WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} ORDER BY CALC_DT DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT MI.MBER_NO , MI.NM , CASE WHEN MOR.MEASURE_DT IS NOT NULL AND MMR.MEASURE_DT IS NOT NULL THEN IF(MOR.MEASURE_DT > MMR.MEASURE_DT, MOR.MEASURE_DT, MMR.MEASURE_DT) WHEN MOR.MEASURE_DT IS NOT NULL AND MMR.MEASURE_DT IS NULL THEN MOR.MEASURE_DT WHEN MOR.MEASURE_DT IS NULL AND MMR.MEASURE_DT IS NOT NULL THEN MMR.MEASURE_DT ELSE '' END MESURE_DT , ROUND(IFNULL(MOR.AGE, MMR.AGE), 1) AGE , IFNULL(ROUND(MMR.MT_AGE, 1), NULL) MT_AGE , IFNULL(ROUND(MMR.MT_CHANGE, 1), NULL) MT_CHANGE , IFNULL(ROUND(MOR.OB_AGE, 1), NULL) OB_AGE , IFNULL(ROUND(MOR.OB_CHANGE, 1), NULL) OB_CHANGE FROM MBER_INFO MI LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO , MEASURE_DT , AGE , BAA OB_CHANGE , AGE + ROUND(BAA, 1) OB_AGE FROM MEDIAGE_MBER_OBSITY_ANL_RESULT WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} ORDER BY MEASURE_DT DESC LIMIT 1 ) MOR ON MI.MBER_NO = MOR.MBER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO , MEASURE_DT , AGE , CAST(MSA AS DECIMAL(10, 1)) MT_CHANGE , AGE + CAST(MSA AS DECIMAL(10, 1)) MT_AGE FROM MEDIAGE_MBER_META_ANL_RESULT WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} ORDER BY MEASURE_DT DESC LIMIT 1 ) MMR ON MI.MBER_NO = MMR.MBER_NO WHERE MI.MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO}

SELECT MBER_NO , SUBSTRING(MEAL_DT, 1, 8) MEAL_DE , SUM(MEAL_CALORIE) MEAL_CALORIE , SUM(MEAL_CARBOHYDRATE) MEAL_CARBOHYDRATE , SUM(MEAL_PROTEIN) MEAL_PROTEIN , SUM(MEAL_FAT) MEAL_FAT , SUM(MEAL_CARBOHYDRATE + MEAL_PROTEIN + MEAL_FAT) TOTAL_NTR FROM MBER_MEAL_DIARY WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND MEAL_DT LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y%m%d'), '%') AND USE_AT = 'Y' GROUP BY MBER_NO, SUBSTRING(MEAL_DT, 1, 8)
SELECT MBER_NO , MAX(CALC_DT) CALC_DT FROM MYBODY_MANAGE_SCORE WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} GROUP BY MBER_NO

SELECT * FROM ( #금회, 전회 SELECT MMS.MBER_NO, ROUND(((WAIST_SCORE * 100) + (BP_SCORE * 100) + (FBS_SCORE * 100) + (TG_SCORE * 100) + (HDLC_SCORE * 100)) / 5, 1) TOT_SCORE, MMS.CALC_DT FROM MYBODY_MANAGE_SCORE MMS INNER JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO , MAX(CALC_DT) CALC_DT FROM MYBODY_MANAGE_SCORE WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} GROUP BY MBER_NO, SUBSTRING(CALC_DT, 1, 8) ) MMMS ON MMS.MBER_NO = MMMS.MBER_NO AND MMS.CALC_DT = MMMS.CALC_DT WHERE MMS.MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} ORDER BY MMS.CALC_DT DESC LIMIT 2 ) A UNION ALL ( #최초 SELECT MBER_NO, ROUND(((WAIST_SCORE * 100) + (BP_SCORE * 100) + (FBS_SCORE * 100) + (TG_SCORE * 100) + (HDLC_SCORE * 100)) / 5, 1) TOT_SCORE, CALC_DT FROM MYBODY_MANAGE_SCORE WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} ORDER BY CALC_DT ASC LIMIT 1 ) UNION ALL ( #3개월 평균 SELECT MMS.MBER_NO, ROUND(AVG(ROUND(((WAIST_SCORE * 100) + (BP_SCORE * 100) + (FBS_SCORE * 100) + (TG_SCORE * 100) + (HDLC_SCORE * 100)) / 5, 1)), 1) TOT_SCORE, '3MONTH' CALC_DT FROM MYBODY_MANAGE_SCORE MMS INNER JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO , MAX(CALC_DT) CALC_DT FROM MYBODY_MANAGE_SCORE WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} GROUP BY MBER_NO, SUBSTRING(CALC_DT, 1, 8) ) MMMS ON MMS.MBER_NO = MMMS.MBER_NO AND MMS.CALC_DT = MMMS.CALC_DT WHERE MMS.MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND MMS.CALC_DT <= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -3 MONTH) GROUP BY MMS.MBER_NO
)

SELECT MBER_NO , CALC_DT , WAIST_SCORE , BP_SCORE , FBS_SCORE , TG_SCORE , HDLC_SCORE FROM ( SELECT MMS.MBER_NO , SUBSTRING(MMS.CALC_DT, 1, 8) CALC_DT , ROUND(WAIST_SCORE * 100, 1) WAIST_SCORE , ROUND(BP_SCORE * 100, 1) BP_SCORE , ROUND(FBS_SCORE * 100, 1) FBS_SCORE , ROUND(TG_SCORE * 100, 1) TG_SCORE , ROUND(HDLC_SCORE * 100, 1) HDLC_SCORE FROM MYBODY_MANAGE_SCORE MMS INNER JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO , MAX(CALC_DT) CALC_DT FROM MYBODY_MANAGE_SCORE WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} GROUP BY MBER_NO, SUBSTRING(CALC_DT, 1, 8) ) MMMS ON MMS.MBER_NO = MMMS.MBER_NO AND MMS.CALC_DT = MMMS.CALC_DT ORDER BY CALC_DT DESC LIMIT 5 ) TBL ORDER BY CALC_DT DESC

MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6021', MESURE_DATA, NULL)) BDWGH , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6022', MESURE_DATA, NULL)) PBF , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6023', MESURE_DATA, NULL)) SLM , TRUNCATE(TBL.HDLC, 0) , LDLC = TRUNCATE(TBL.LDLC, 0) , STRS_SCORE = TRUNCATE(TBL.STRS_SCORE, 0) , PHYSIC_STRS = TRUNCATE(TBL.PHYSIC_STRS, 0) , MNTL_STRS = TRUNCATE(TBL.MNTL_STRS, 0) , STRS_CNTRMSR_ABLTY = TRUNCATE(TBL.STRS_CNTRMSR_ABLTY, 0) , BLDVSS_STEP = TRUNCATE(TBL.BLDVSS_STEP, 0) , CAD_OUTPUT_IN = TRUNCATE(TBL.CAD_OUTPUT_IN, 0) , ELSTC_DGREE = TRUNCATE(TBL.ELSTC_DGREE, 0) , RBV_QY = TRUNCATE(TBL.RBV_QY, 0)

HEIGHT , IF(BDWGH > 300, NULL, ROUND(BDWGH, 2)) BDWGH , IF(PBF > 99.9, NULL, ROUND(PBF, 2)) PBF , IF(SLM > 300, NULL, ROUND(SLM, 2)) SLM , IF(VFL > 99, NULL, ROUND(VFL, 2)) VFL , IF(BMR > 5000, NULL, 300.0, NULL, ROUND(WAIST_CRCMFRNC, 2)) WAIST_CRCMFRNC , IF(SYSTOLIC > 300, NULL, TRUNCATE(SYSTOLIC, 0)) SYSTOLIC , IF(DIASTOLIC > 300, NULL, TRUNCATE(DIASTOLIC, 0)) DIASTOLIC , IF(PULS > 300, NULL, TRUNCATE(PULS, 0)) PULS , IF(FBS > 999, NULL, TRUNCATE(FBS, 0)) FBS , IF(PP2 > 999, NULL, TRUNCATE(PP2, 0)) PP2 , IF(T_CHOL > 999, NULL, TRUNCATE(T_CHOL, 0)) T_CHOL , IF(TG > 999, NULL, TRUNCATE(TG, 0)) TG , IF(HDLC > 999, NULL, TRUNCATE(HDLC, 0)) HDLC , IF(LDLC > 999, NULL, TRUNCATE(LDLC, 0)) LDLC , IF(STRS_SCORE > 99.9, NULL, TRUNCATE(STRS_SCORE, 0)) STRS_SCORE , IF(PHYSIC_STRS > 99.9, NULL, TRUNCATE(PHYSIC_STRS, 0)) PHYSIC_STRS , IF(MNTL_STRS > 99.9, NULL, TRUNCATE(MNTL_STRS, 0)) MNTL_STRS , IF(STRS_CNTRMSR_ABLTY > 99.9, NULL, TRUNCATE(STRS_CNTRMSR_ABLTY, 0)) STRS_CNTRMSR_ABLTY , IF(BLDVSS_STEP > 99.9, NULL, TRUNCATE(BLDVSS_STEP, 0)) BLDVSS_STEP , IF(CAD_OUTPUT_IN > 99.9, NULL, TRUNCATE(CAD_OUTPUT_IN, 0)) CAD_OUTPUT_IN , IF(ELSTC_DGREE > 99.9, NULL, TRUNCATE(ELSTC_DGREE, 0)) ELSTC_DGREE , IF(RBV_QY > 99.9, NULL, TRUNCATE(RBV_QY, 0)) RBV_QY FROM ( SELECT MBER_NO , SUBSTRING(MESURE_DE, 1, 6) MESURE_MT , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(HEIGHT > 0, HEIGHT, NULL)), NULL), 1) HEIGHT , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(BDWGH > 0, BDWGH, NULL)), NULL), 2) BDWGH , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(PBF > 0, PBF, NULL)) , NULL), 2) PBF , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(SLM > 0, SLM, NULL)) , NULL), 2) SLM , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(VFL > 0, VFL, NULL)), NULL), 0) VFL , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(BMR > 0, BMR, NULL)) , NULL), 0) BMR , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(EST_BN_MAS > 0, EST_BN_MAS, NULL)) , NULL), 2) EST_BN_MAS , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(BMI > 0, BMI, NULL)) , NULL), 2) BMI , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(FAT_MAS > 0, FAT_MAS, NULL)), NULL), 2) FAT_MAS , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(WAIST_CRCMFRNC > 0, WAIST_CRCMFRNC, NULL)), NULL), 2) WAIST_CRCMFRNC , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(SYSTOLIC > 0, SYSTOLIC, NULL)), NULL), 0) SYSTOLIC , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(DIASTOLIC > 0, DIASTOLIC, NULL)), NULL), 0) DIASTOLIC , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(PULS > 0, PULS, NULL)), NULL), 0) PULS , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(FBS > 0, FBS, NULL)), NULL), 0) FBS , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(PP2 > 0, PP2, NULL)), NULL), 0) PP2 , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(T_CHOL > 0, T_CHOL, NULL)), NULL), 0) T_CHOL , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(TG > 0, TG, NULL)), NULL), 0) TG , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(HDLC > 0, HDLC, NULL)), NULL), 0) HDLC , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(IF(LDLC > 0, LDLC, NULL)), NULL), 0) LDLC , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(STRS_SCORE), NULL), 0) STRS_SCORE , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(PHYSIC_STRS), NULL), 0) PHYSIC_STRS , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(MNTL_STRS), NULL), 0) MNTL_STRS , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(STRS_CNTRMSR_ABLTY) , NULL), 0) STRS_CNTRMSR_ABLTY , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(BLDVSS_STEP), NULL), 0) BLDVSS_STEP , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(CAD_OUTPUT_IN), NULL), 0) CAD_OUTPUT_IN , ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(ELSTC_DGREE), NULL), 0) ELSTC_DGREE , TRUNCATE(TBL.BLDVSS_STEP, 0) , CAD_OUTPUT_IN = TRUNCATE(TBL.CAD_OUTPUT_IN, 0) , ELSTC_DGREE = TRUNCATE(TBL.ELSTC_DGREE, 0) , RBV_QY = TRUNCATE(TBL.RBV_QY, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(MBER_NO) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END MESURE_YN FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN_TIME WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND ( SYSTOLIC IS NOT NULL OR FBS IS NOT NULL OR TG IS NOT NULL OR HDLC IS NOT NULL OR MEDI_WAIST IS NOT NULL )

SELECT MIC.NM , MIC.NCM , MIC.RK , MIC.TOT_STEPS , PMIC.PRE_RK , PMIC.PRE_TOT_STEPS FROM ( SELECT TBL.MBER_NO , NM , NCM , @RANK_COUNT := @RANK_COUNT + 1 RN , CAST(IF(@SPORTS_TOT_STEPS = SPORTS_TOT_STEPS, @RANK, @RANK := @RANK_COUNT) AS UNSIGNED) RK , CAST(IF(@SPORTS_TOT_STEPS = SPORTS_TOT_STEPS, @SPORTS_TOT_STEPS, @SPORTS_TOT_STEPS := SPORTS_TOT_STEPS) AS UNSIGNED) TOT_STEPS FROM ( SELECT MI.MBER_NO , MI.NM , MI.NCM , IFNULL(MICD.SPORTS_TOT_STEPS, 0) SPORTS_TOT_STEPS , @SPORTS_TOT_STEPS := 0 , @RANK := 1 , @RANK_COUNT := 0 FROM ( SELECT MI.MBER_NO , MI.NM , MI.NCM FROM MBER_INFO MI INNER JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO FROM MBER_PSTINST_INFO WHERE INST_NO = #{INST_NO} AND CONFM_AT = 'Y' AND SECSN_AT = 'N' GROUP BY MBER_NO ) MPI ON MI.MBER_NO = MPI.MBER_NO WHERE MI.MBER_SECSN_AT = 'N' ) MI LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MICD.MBER_NO , SUM(MICD.SPORTS_TOT_STEPS) SPORTS_TOT_STEPS FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN_DALY MICD INNER JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO FROM MBER_PSTINST_INFO WHERE INST_NO = #{INST_NO} AND CONFM_AT = 'Y' AND SECSN_AT = 'N' GROUP BY MBER_NO ) MPI ON MICD.MBER_NO = MPI.MBER_NO AND MICD.MESURE_DE BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL-(DAYOFWEEK(NOW())-1 ) DAY),"%Y%m%d") AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL (7 - (DAYOFWEEK(NOW()))) DAY),"%Y%m%d") GROUP BY MICD.MBER_NO ) MICD ON MI.MBER_NO = MICD.MBER_NO ORDER BY SPORTS_TOT_STEPS DESC, MI.MBER_NO ASC ) TBL ) MIC LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TBL.MBER_NO , @PRE_RANK_COUNT := @PRE_RANK_COUNT + 1 PRE_RN , CAST(IF(@PRE_SPORTS_TOT_STEPS = SPORTS_TOT_STEPS, @PRE_RANK, @PRE_RANK := @PRE_RANK_COUNT) AS UNSIGNED) PRE_RK , CAST(IF(@PRE_SPORTS_TOT_STEPS = SPORTS_TOT_STEPS, @PRE_SPORTS_TOT_STEPS, @PRE_SPORTS_TOT_STEPS := SPORTS_TOT_STEPS) AS UNSIGNED) PRE_TOT_STEPS FROM ( SELECT MI.MBER_NO , IFNULL(MICD.SPORTS_TOT_STEPS, 0) SPORTS_TOT_STEPS , @PRE_SPORTS_TOT_STEPS := 0 , @PRE_RANK := 1 , @PRE_RANK_COUNT := 0 FROM ( SELECT MI.MBER_NO FROM MBER_INFO MI INNER JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO FROM MBER_PSTINST_INFO WHERE INST_NO = #{INST_NO} AND CONFM_AT = 'Y' AND SECSN_AT = 'N' GROUP BY MBER_NO ) MPI ON MI.MBER_NO = MPI.MBER_NO WHERE MI.MBER_SECSN_AT = 'N' ) MI LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MICD.MBER_NO , SUM(MICD.SPORTS_TOT_STEPS) SPORTS_TOT_STEPS FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN_DALY MICD INNER JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO FROM MBER_PSTINST_INFO WHERE INST_NO = #{INST_NO} AND CONFM_AT = 'Y' AND SECSN_AT = 'N' GROUP BY MBER_NO ) MPI ON MICD.MBER_NO = MPI.MBER_NO AND MICD.MESURE_DE BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK), INTERVAL-(DAYOFWEEK(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK))-1 ) DAY),"%Y%m%d") AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK), INTERVAL (7 - (DAYOFWEEK(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK)))) DAY),"%Y%m%d") GROUP BY MICD.MBER_NO ) MICD ON MI.MBER_NO = MICD.MBER_NO ORDER BY SPORTS_TOT_STEPS DESC, MI.MBER_NO ASC ) TBL ) PMIC ON MIC.MBER_NO = PMIC.MBER_NO WHERE 1 = 1
AND MIC.MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO}

SELECT MBER_NO , MESURE_DT
, SYSTOLIC , DIASTOLIC , PULS , CASE WHEN INSTR(SYSTOLIC_JDGMNT, '나쁨') > 0 OR INSTR(DIASTOLIC_JDGMNT, '나쁨') > 0 THEN '나쁨' WHEN INSTR(SYSTOLIC_JDGMNT, '주의') > 0 OR INSTR(DIASTOLIC_JDGMNT, '주의') > 0 THEN '주의' WHEN INSTR(SYSTOLIC_JDGMNT, '좋음') > 0 OR INSTR(DIASTOLIC_JDGMNT, '좋음') > 0 THEN '좋음' ELSE '판정없음' END BP_JDGMNT
, FBS , PP2 , CASE WHEN INSTR(FBS_JDGMNT, '나쁨') > 0 OR INSTR(PP2_JDGMNT, '나쁨') > 0 THEN '나쁨' WHEN INSTR(FBS_JDGMNT, '주의') > 0 OR INSTR(PP2_JDGMNT, '주의') > 0 THEN '주의' WHEN INSTR(FBS_JDGMNT, '좋음') > 0 OR INSTR(PP2_JDGMNT, '좋음') > 0 THEN '좋음' ELSE '판정없음' END BS_JDGMNT
, BDWGH , WAIST , HEIGHT , BDHEAT , CASE WHEN INSTR(BDWGH_JDGMNT, '나쁨') > 0 OR INSTR(WAIST_JDGMNT, '나쁨') > 0 OR INSTR(BDHEAT_JDGMNT, '나쁨') > 0 THEN '나쁨' WHEN INSTR(BDWGH_JDGMNT, '적음') > 0 OR INSTR(BDWGH_JDGMNT, '주의') > 0 OR INSTR(WAIST_JDGMNT, '주의') > 0 OR INSTR(BDHEAT_JDGMNT, '주의') > 0 THEN '주의' WHEN INSTR(BDWGH_JDGMNT, '좋음') > 0 OR INSTR(WAIST_JDGMNT, '좋음') > 0 OR INSTR(BDHEAT_JDGMNT, '좋음') > 0 THEN '좋음' ELSE '판정없음' END BD_INFO
, BDWGH , PBF , SLM , VFL , BMR , EST_BN_MAS , BMI , IFNULL(FAT_MAS, ROUND(PBF * (BDWGH * 0.01), 2)) FAT_MAS , WAIST , CASE WHEN INSTR(BDWGH_JDGMNT, '나쁨') > 0 OR INSTR(IFNULL(FAT_MAS_JDGMNT, F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MBER_NO, '8010', ROUND(PBF * (BDWGH * 0.01), 2), #{LOCALE})), '나쁨') > 0 OR INSTR(SLM_JDGMNT, '나쁨') > 0 OR INSTR(EST_BN_MAS_JDGMNT, '나쁨') > 0 THEN '나쁨' WHEN INSTR(BDWGH_JDGMNT, '적음') > 0 OR INSTR(BDWGH_JDGMNT, '주의') > 0 OR INSTR(IFNULL(FAT_MAS_JDGMNT, F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MBER_NO, '8010', ROUND(PBF * (BDWGH * 0.01), 2), #{LOCALE})), '주의') > 0 OR INSTR(SLM_JDGMNT, '주의') > 0 OR INSTR(EST_BN_MAS_JDGMNT, '주의') > 0 THEN '주의' WHEN INSTR(BDWGH_JDGMNT, '좋음') > 0 OR INSTR(IFNULL(FAT_MAS_JDGMNT, F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MBER_NO, '8010', ROUND(PBF * (BDWGH * 0.01), 2), #{LOCALE})), '좋음') > 0 OR INSTR(SLM_JDGMNT, '좋음') > 0 OR INSTR(EST_BN_MAS_JDGMNT, '좋음') > 0 THEN '좋음' ELSE '판정없음' END BD_CMPS , CASE WHEN INSTR(BMI_JDGMNT, '나쁨') > 0 OR INSTR(PBF_JDGMNT, '나쁨') > 0 OR INSTR(VFL_JDGMNT, '나쁨') > 0 OR INSTR(BMR_JDGMNT, '나쁨') > 0 THEN '나쁨' WHEN INSTR(BMI_JDGMNT, '주의') > 0 OR INSTR(PBF_JDGMNT, '주의') > 0 OR INSTR(VFL_JDGMNT, '주의') > 0 OR INSTR(BMR_JDGMNT, '주의') > 0 THEN '주의' WHEN INSTR(BMI_JDGMNT, '좋음') > 0 OR INSTR(PBF_JDGMNT, '좋음') > 0 OR INSTR(VFL_JDGMNT, '좋음') > 0 OR INSTR(BMR_JDGMNT, '좋음') > 0 THEN '좋음' ELSE '판정없음' END OB_JDGMNT
FROM ( SELECT MIC.MBER_NO , MIC.MESURE_DT
, MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '622E', MIC.MESURE_DATA, NULL)) SYSTOLIC , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '622F', MIC.MESURE_DATA, NULL)) DIASTOLIC , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6230', MIC.MESURE_DATA, NULL)) PULS , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '622E', F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MIC.MBER_NO, MIC.MESURE_CODE, MIC.MESURE_DATA, #{LOCALE}), NULL)) SYSTOLIC_JDGMNT , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '622F', F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MIC.MBER_NO, MIC.MESURE_CODE, MIC.MESURE_DATA, #{LOCALE}), NULL)) DIASTOLIC_JDGMNT
, MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '624A', MIC.MESURE_DATA, NULL)) FBS , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '624B', MIC.MESURE_DATA, NULL)) PP2 , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '624A', F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MIC.MBER_NO, MIC.MESURE_CODE, MIC.MESURE_DATA, #{LOCALE}), NULL)) FBS_JDGMNT , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '624B', F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MIC.MBER_NO, MIC.MESURE_CODE, MIC.MESURE_DATA, #{LOCALE}), NULL)) PP2_JDGMNT
, MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6021', MIC.MESURE_DATA, NULL)) BDWGH , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '8072', MIC.MESURE_DATA, NULL)) WAIST , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6A35', MIC.MESURE_DATA, NULL)) HEIGHT , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '5010', MIC.MESURE_DATA, NULL)) BDHEAT , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6021', F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MIC.MBER_NO, MIC.MESURE_CODE, MIC.MESURE_DATA, #{LOCALE}), NULL)) BDWGH_JDGMNT , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '8072', F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MIC.MBER_NO, MIC.MESURE_CODE, MIC.MESURE_DATA, #{LOCALE}), NULL)) WAIST_JDGMNT , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '5010', F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MIC.MBER_NO, MIC.MESURE_CODE, MIC.MESURE_DATA, #{LOCALE}), NULL)) BDHEAT_JDGMNT
, MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6021', MIC.MESURE_DATA, NULL)) BDWGH , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6022', MIC.MESURE_DATA, NULL)) PBF , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6023', MIC.MESURE_DATA, NULL)) SLM , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6026', MIC.MESURE_DATA, NULL)) VFL , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6027', MIC.MESURE_DATA, NULL)) BMR , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6029', MIC.MESURE_DATA, NULL)) EST_BN_MAS , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6056', MIC.MESURE_DATA, NULL)) BMI , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '8010', MIC.MESURE_DATA, NULL)) FAT_MAS , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '8072', MIC.MESURE_DATA, NULL)) WAIST , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6021', F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MIC.MBER_NO, MIC.MESURE_CODE, MIC.MESURE_DATA, #{LOCALE}), NULL)) BDWGH_JDGMNT , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6022', F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MIC.MBER_NO, MIC.MESURE_CODE, MIC.MESURE_DATA, #{LOCALE}), NULL)) PBF_JDGMNT , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6023', F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MIC.MBER_NO, MIC.MESURE_CODE, MIC.MESURE_DATA, #{LOCALE}), NULL)) SLM_JDGMNT , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6026', F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MIC.MBER_NO, MIC.MESURE_CODE, MIC.MESURE_DATA, #{LOCALE}), NULL)) VFL_JDGMNT , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6027', F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MIC.MBER_NO, MIC.MESURE_CODE, MIC.MESURE_DATA, #{LOCALE}), NULL)) BMR_JDGMNT , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6029', F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MIC.MBER_NO, MIC.MESURE_CODE, MIC.MESURE_DATA, #{LOCALE}), NULL)) EST_BN_MAS_JDGMNT , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '6056', F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MIC.MBER_NO, MIC.MESURE_CODE, MIC.MESURE_DATA, #{LOCALE}), NULL)) BMI_JDGMNT , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '8010', F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MIC.MBER_NO, MIC.MESURE_CODE, MIC.MESURE_DATA, #{LOCALE}), NULL)) FAT_MAS_JDGMNT , MAX(IF(MIC.MESURE_CODE = '8072', F_MESURE_GRAD_NM(MIC.MBER_NO, MIC.MESURE_CODE, MIC.MESURE_DATA, #{LOCALE}), NULL)) WAIST_JDGMNT
FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN MIC INNER JOIN ( SELECT MBER_NO , MESURE_DT FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND MESURE_CODE IN (
'622E', '622F', '6230'
'624A', '624B'
'5010', '6A35', '6021', '8072'
'6022', '6023', '6026', '6027', '6029', '8010'
) GROUP BY MBER_NO, MESURE_DT ORDER BY MESURE_DT DESC LIMIT 5 ) MMIC ON MIC.MBER_NO = MMIC.MBER_NO AND MIC.MESURE_DT = MMIC.MESURE_DT GROUP BY MIC.MBER_NO, MIC.MESURE_DT ) TBL
SELECT MBER_NO, MESURE_DE, BH_TNT_SCORE FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN_DALY WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND BH_TNT_SCORE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY MESURE_DE DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT MICT.MBER_NO, MICT.MESURE_DT, MICT.MESURE_DATA BHTOT, MICC.MESURE_DATA BHRCO, MICR.MESURE_DATA BHBLD FROM ( #종합점수 SELECT MBER_NO, MESURE_DT, MESURE_DATA FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND MESURE_CODE = '10010' ORDER BY MESURE_DT DESC LIMIT 1 ) MICT INNER JOIN ( #뇌 인지 기능 점수 SELECT MBER_NO, MESURE_DT, MESURE_DATA FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND MESURE_CODE = '10007' ORDER BY MESURE_DT DESC LIMIT 1 ) MICC ON MICT.MBER_NO = MICC.MBER_NO AND MICT.MESURE_DT = MICC.MESURE_DT INNER JOIN ( #뇌혈류 기능 점수 SELECT MBER_NO, MESURE_DT, MESURE_DATA FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND MESURE_CODE = '10009' ORDER BY MESURE_DT DESC LIMIT 1 ) MICR ON MICC.MBER_NO = MICR.MBER_NO AND MICC.MESURE_DT = MICR.MESURE_DT

SELECT MBER_NO, MESURE_DE, BB_FNCT, CB_FNCT, CB_ABLTY, CB_FNCT_SCORE, DATE_FORMAT(UPDT_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') MESURE_DT FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN_DALY WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND BB_FNCT IS NOT NULL AND CB_FNCT IS NOT NULL AND CB_ABLTY IS NOT NULL AND CB_FNCT_SCORE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY MESURE_DE DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT MBER_NO, MESURE_DE, BBF_ADJST_TIME, BBF_FNCT_SCORE, DATE_FORMAT(UPDT_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') MESURE_DT FROM MESURE_INFO_CMMN_DALY WHERE MBER_NO = #{MBER_NO} AND BBF_ADJST_TIME IS NOT NULL AND BBF_FNCT_SCORE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY MESURE_DE DESC LIMIT 5
